pli-tv-pvr6:1.1: I asked about ordination with its provenance, with its demonstration:
pli-tv-pvr6:1.2: how many are the offences according to the eminent sentences?
pli-tv-pvr6:1.3: I was answered about ordination with its provenance, with its demonstration:
pli-tv-pvr6:1.4: according to the eminent sentences there are two offences.
